name: Baby Unicorn Rainbow Pet Care
description:
Hello Unicorn games lovers! Waltz into the adventurous world of rainbows and sunshines! A magical game flowing with cute unicorns. You will play as a nanny of a baby pet in this amazing my unicorn game. Visit the pony pet daycare and have the opportunity to interact with other cute baby pets at the daycare. Like any other pet, baby unicorns also need the same amount of care and you will help nurture it. The Unicorn baby pet care game is full of fun and surprising activities for you. As a babysitter, you have to make sure that you keep them healthy and happy in a free unicorn game. You have all the reigns in your hand in these unicorn girls games, so you can make exciting and amazing choices for your baby pet unicorn.

Saddle up to venture through the stables in this horse care game. Play on the farm with other cute ponies and join them for happy play sessions in baby animal games. As a baby game lover make sure that the baby pet has lots of fun and playtime in pony games. The best pony makeover game you will play because of its multifunctionalities and colorful pony gameplay.

Looking after a baby pet is not easy as it needs more than just your attention. You will have to bathe, dress up, style your hair, and feed your pet unicorn baby in this pet care game. Look after your animal pet and make sure to do all the chores on time. Know the likes and dislikes of your baby pet and keep a happy pet all the time. Bake and decorate cake for your unicorn baby pets in this pet care game for kids. Whenever the baby pet is hungry, give her the food that she is thinking about in baby care game.

If you love unicorn dress up games, pet care games, and unicorns, then this girls game for free is ideal for you. You will have to guess the baby unicorn’s favorite food and feed it to her afterwards because after all it is still a baby and cannot feed herself. You can also decide what color outfit you want her to wear and style her hair in a variety of hairstyles available for you in baby unicorn games.

Use a hair straightener or a curler to style her hair like in the pony hair styling games. In this girls game you can even choose the hair color for her. Make her look funky and cool by choosing pink color or go for a natural hair color in a baby pet game.

Take your talking unicorn baby to an animal pet care center to make sure it is healthy. Give a Bath to a unicorn in the bubble water in this kids game. Baby unicorns love water so apply soap before washing her with water. Clean her mouth afterwards using a colorful toothbrush and a special tongue cleaner. Rinse her mouth with a mouthwash made especially for baby pets in the unicorn games. Clean your pet and make it’s rainbow horn look extra cute by properly cleaning it.

Lastly, make sure that your pet rests after a long day. Put her to sleep and let her dream about the magical world of the unicorn game.

Key Features:

Real life experience of pet babysitting game
Your very own virtual pet game.
Multiple exciting levels
Lots of cute dresses & hairstyles
Baking cake & cooking food
